DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of triamcinolone acetonide in silicone-filled eyes on the outcome of surgery for PVR.
DOC.brief_title: Triamcinolone Acetonide in Silicone-Filled Eyes as Adjunctive Treatment for Proliferative Vitreoretinopathy
DOC.criteria: Cases of rhegmatogenous retinal detachment complicated by PVR grade C undergoing vitrectomy and silicone oil tamponade. History of trauma Presence of diabetic retinopathy History of vein occlusion Giant retinal tear
